items.title: Israel Becoming “Crypto Powerhouse,” But ICO Regulation Uncertainty Could Hinder Growth
items.description:
It’s been almost ten years since blockchain technology was used to create the world’s first cryptocurrency, Bitcoin. Since then, the popularity of such decentralized coins has skyrocketed, with over a thousand digital coins being in circulation today. This booming popularity of cryptocurrencies has created an alternative funding method for technology companies in the industry: Initial … Continue reading Israel Becoming “Crypto Powerhouse,” But ICO Regulation Uncertainty Could Hinder Growth

The post Israel Becoming “Crypto Powerhouse,” But ICO Regulation Uncertainty Could Hinder Growth appeared first on NewsBTC.

items.title: Scammers Steal Over $1.8 Mln By Posing As Admins of Steele ICO
items.description: Fake admins at ICO scammed investors out of $1.8 mln in Ether over Seele’s telegram channel #NEWS

items.title: Reinventing ICO Research and Reviews with Revain
items.description:
The crypto space is going to get very crowded in the next year or two so finding the right token or ICO to invest in will become more of a challenge. Big social media platforms do not help much as content is unregulated, unedited, and they are largely populated by trolls and shills. Scams and fake news are rife and the companies that own the platforms even profit from advertising fraudulent websites. What is needed

Read More

The post Reinventing ICO Research and Reviews with Revain appeared first on Bitcoinist.com.

items.title: CoinLoan ICO Reaches Major Milestones as it Launches MVP and Enables Direct Fiat Investment
Texas Takes Aim at Overseas ICO with Cease-and-Desist
items.description: The Texas State Securities Board has ordered a cease-and-desist to an overseas ICO that allegedly solicited investors within its jurisdiction.
